entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening with risk of freezing rain. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 early in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
